path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Doge Superbowl Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Authorized_0 addresses can withdraw contract balance
findings.description: The Authorized_0 address has the privilege to withdraw the entire contract balance.

findings.title: Authorized_0 addresses can enable/disable token and stake pause
findings.description: Authorized_0 addresses have the privilege to enable or disable token and stake pause.

findings.title: Authorized_1 addresses can change fees
findings.description: Authorized_1 addresses have the privilege to modify fees, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized_1 addresses can change max transaction amount
findings.description: Authorized_1 addresses have the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized_1 addresses can change max account amount
findings.description: The finding indicates that Authorized_1 addresses have the privilege to modify the maximum account amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized_0 addresses can exclude from token pause
findings.description: Authorized_0 addresses have the privilege to exclude certain tokens from being paused.

findings.title: Authorized_2 addresses can exclude from fees
findings.description: Authorized_2 addresses have the privilege to exclude from fees without proper validation or access control.

findings.title: Authorized_2 addresses can exclude from amount limit
findings.description: Authorized_2 addresses have the privilege to exclude from amount limit, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized_2 addresses can include account in exemptStaker array
findings.description: Authorized_2 addresses have the privilege to include an account in the exemptStaker array.

findings.title: Authorized_0 addresses can change administration wallet
findings.description: Authorized_0 addresses have the privilege to modify the administration wallet.

findings.title: Authorized_3 addresses can manually buyback
findings.description: Authorized_3 addresses have the privilege to manually initiate a buyback process.

findings.title: Authorized_3 addresses can manually buyback and burn
findings.description: Authorized_3 addresses have the privilege to manually buy back and burn tokens, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized_0 addresses can change WBNB_IGT_PAIR and WBNB_BUSD_PAIR
findings.description: Authorized_0 addresses have the privilege to modify WBNB_IGT_PAIR and WBNB_BUSD_PAIR, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized_1 addresses can change fee administration wallet
findings.description: Authorized_1 addresses have the privilege to modify the fee administration wallet without proper restrictions.

findings.title: Authorized_0 addresses can approve any ERC20 token amount for spender
findings.description: Authorized_0 addresses have the privilege to approve any ERC20 token amount for a spender without restrictions.
